backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining a Product type with CRUD-style queries and utilities for sorting and grouping products by brand.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking theme‑related updates to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing short summaries for key frontend components, hooks, styles, and config modules.
frontend/.env: Environment variables defining app name and slug for branding.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for the Turtle Wax‑inspired color palette.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document setting page metadata and loading the React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that sets the title, loads products, groups them by brand, and renders themed sections.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section presenting branding info and feature highlights with themed icons and text.
frontend/src/components/BrandSection.tsx: Displays a brand header and a grid of ProductCard components for that brand.
frontend/src/components/BrandsSection.ts: Static section describing Turtle Wax and 3M with themed cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable alert component for error and no‑data states.
frontend/src/components/HomeHero.tsx: Hero section with headline, description, and themed image banner.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Card component showing product image, name, description, and tags with hover styling.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with current year, branding name, and a referral link including hostname-based tracking.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides a sticky header with logo, branding, and smooth-scroll navigation for desktop and mobile menus.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Exports centralized branding values such as app name, slug, and tagline from environment variables.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and stored identity restoration logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches product data from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and a green-yellow themed design using CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins aligned with the project’s theme.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature history, and architectural notes for the car care products site.
